situation.title: Theater
situation.meta_description: Theatre and other artistic performances are prohibited.

situation.title: Cinemas
situation.meta_description: Cinemas are not allowed to operate. This ban applies to movie screenings taking place both outdoors and indoors.

situation.title: Concerts
situation.meta_description: Concerts are not allowed to take place.

situation.title: Social events
situation.meta_description: The ban on free movement also restricts holding any social events

situation.title: Galleries, museums
situation.meta_description: Visits to galleries, museums, exhibition spaces, etc. are prohibited.

situation.title: Festivals
situation.meta_description: Festivals are not allowed to take place.
